answers.answer: I've Had It With Both My Pregnancies. And I Pregnant Again With My Third And My Dr Does Tests Every Month TI Make Sure I Don't Get It Again.
What is it like , what to expect

With My First I Didn't Even Know I Had It I Felt Fine But Then I Went In And My Blood Pressure Was Super High And I Had Protein In My Urine And I  Was Have Little CoNtractiOns So Then They I Fixed Me And Put Me On Magnesium And Patocin But I Could Walk Around The Halls To Help Labor Or Anything ThEy Made Me Stay In Bed The Whole Time. Cuz Magnesium Makes Your Body Weak I Guess. It Wasn't A Fun Experience But The Made Me Get The Epidural Cuz They Said It Would Be Better IF I Got It Because Then My Blood Pressure Would Most Likely Go Down Which It Did But I Don't Member Too Much After The Epidural.
How many weeks were you ?Were you hospitalized all the way til birth ?

I Was 36 Weeks And They Induced Me That Night I Had Went In Cuz Everyone I Went To The Dr I Guess My Blood Pressure Kept Getting Higher And Higher But The Dr Never Told Be That It Was Getting Worse So When I Did Go In They Said It Was Dangerously High And Didn't Understand Why They Didn't put Me In The Hospital. And With My Daughter I Was 38 Weeks With My Daughter When They INduced Me. But I Was Never Hospitalized Before They Induced Me.
Oh okay it have me kinda scared
You'll Be Fine As Long As The Drs Take Care Of It When Needed. I Was Fine And I Had It With Both My Babies And I Might Get It With This Pregnancies.
